chapters.title: Chapter 57:  A Rabbit for SupperEpilogue:  And After
chapters.info: Lady Selene, p. 841—A woman Rand met in the alternate universe he reached via Portal Stone by accident. He thought she was the most beautiful woman he ever met. Selene was actually just an identity that Lanfear assumed to guide Rand; she did not want to reveal her true identity to him before she established his trust. See also Eronaile, Mierin; Lanfear.
